sources.title: The Graduation Exercise (1935)
sources.description: Scrappy and Oopy are on their way to Scrappy’s last day of class. Oopy’s distractions cause Scrappy to be late to graduation, so Oopy devises a plot to sneak into class so Scrappy can still graduate. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/the-graduation-exercise-1935/

metadata.Plot: Scrappy and Oopie dawdle on their way to school the day a member of the school board is to show up and hand out diplomas. They're so late, the old-maid teacher locks the door against them. So they pull the gag of taking a false beard and having Oopie stand on Scrappy's shoulders, both in a long coat, pretending to be the school board member.That makes up about half the cartoon, so it doesn't have a chance to wear out its welcome, especially when Oopie takes the opportunity to play tricks on the teacher and the hated class grind. It's not a great cartoon, by any means, but it's fairly painless.
